gov.nist.secauto.decima.core.assessment

Class AssessmentReactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nist.secauto.decima.core.assessment.AssessmentReactor

  • public class AssessmentReactor
extends Object
    Provides a reusable execution environment for executing assessments using a a common set of requirements.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AssessmentReactor(RequirementsManager requirementsManager)
      Creates a new reactor supporting assessments related to the requirements managed by the provided RequirementsManager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RequirementsManager getRequirementsManager()
      Retrieves the managed requirements associated with this reactor.
      protected AssessmentResultBuilder newAssessmentResultBuilder()
      Creates a new AssessmentResultBuilder to use when producing assessment results.

      AssessmentReactor      		 pushAssessmentExecution(DOC document, AssessmentExecutor<DOC> executor)
      Adds a new assessment execution for the reactor to perform.
      AssessmentResults react()
      Conducts all queued assessments.

      Conducts all queued assessments.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AssessmentReactor

        public AssessmentReactor(RequirementsManager requirementsManager)
        Creates a new reactor supporting assessments related to the requirements managed by the provided RequirementsManager.
        Parameters:
        requirementsManager - the manager providing a set of managed requirements to perform assessments against

      • getRequirementsManager

        public RequirementsManager getRequirementsManager()
        Retrieves the managed requirements associated with this reactor.
        Returns:
        the managed requirements

      • pushAssessmentExecution

        public <DOC extends Document> AssessmentReactor pushAssessmentExecution(DOC document,
                                                                        AssessmentExecutor<DOC> executor)
        Adds a new assessment execution for the reactor to perform.
        Type Parameters:
        DOC - the type of document to be assessed
        Parameters:
        document - the document to assess
        executor - the executor to use to perform the provided assessment
        Returns:
        this reactor

      • react

        public AssessmentResults react()
                        throws AssessmentException
        Conducts all queued assessments.
        Returns:
        a set of assessment results based on the evaluated assessments
        Throws:
        AssessmentException - if an error occurred while conducting the assessments

      • react

        public AssessmentResults react(AssessmentResultBuilder builder)
                        throws AssessmentException
        Conducts all queued assessments.
        Parameters:
        builder - the AssessmentResultBuilder to append results to
        Returns:
        a set of assessment results based on the evaluated assessments
        Throws:
        AssessmentException - if an error occurred while conducting the assessments

      • newAssessmentResultBuilder

        protected AssessmentResultBuilder newAssessmentResultBuilder()
        Creates a new AssessmentResultBuilder to use when producing assessment results.

        Sub-classes can use this method to customize the assessment result production pipeline.

        Returns:
        a new result builder instance
